data.taskTitle: user tries to remove project from jat (pixel-art) and nothing happens
user tries to remove project from jat (pixel-art) and nothing happens
data.approach: Found the bug: handleDeleteProject in config/+page.svelte just calls loadProjects() instead of actually deleting. The delete logic exists in ProjectEditor but is never invoked from ProjectCard. Will implement the DELETE API call directly in handleDeleteProject.

data.taskTitle: user tries to remove project from jat (pixel-art) and nothing happens
summary: Fixed handleDeleteProject in config/+page.svelte to actually call DELETE /api/projects
Previously it only called loadProjects() without making the API call
Now shows success/error toasts for user feedback

data.taskTitle: Fix project delete button doing nothing
summary: Fixed project delete returning 404 by extracting project key from path instead of using display name
The API expects the config key (e.g. test2) but was receiving the display name (e.g. Test Project 2)

quality.preExisting: Delete button lacks proper event handling

suggestedTasks.title: Implement Proper Delete Project Event Handling
suggestedTasks.description: Develop a robust delete project method in the project management component. Ensure the handleDelete function in the delete button actually triggers project removal. Verify deletion logic includes proper state management, API calls, and error handling. Test across different project scenarios to confirm consistent behavior.
suggestedTasks.reason: Current delete button is non-functional and prevents user project management

suggestedTasks.title: Add Unit Tests for Project Deletion Workflow
suggestedTasks.description: Create comprehensive unit tests for project deletion functionality. Cover scenarios including successful deletion, error handling, permission checks, and state updates. Implement tests in the project management test suite to ensure reliable delete operations.
suggestedTasks.reason: Need to validate delete functionality and prevent regressions

patterns: Ensure event handlers have clear, testable logic
gotchas: Delete button currently has no functional implementation

documentationNeeds: Update user guide with project deletion instructions
